verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump 's personal attorney , Rudy Giuliani ,] [V: said] [ARGM-LOC: in a marathon 45-minute interview with CNN Friday] [ARG1: that special counsel Robert Mueller agreed to narrow the scope of a potential interview with the president] .

President Donald Trump 's personal attorney , Rudy Giuliani , said in a marathon 45-minute interview with CNN Friday that [ARG0: special counsel Robert Mueller] [V: agreed] [ARG1: to narrow the scope of a potential interview with the president] .

President Donald Trump 's personal attorney , Rudy Giuliani , said in a marathon 45-minute interview with CNN Friday that [ARG0: special counsel Robert Mueller] agreed to [V: narrow] [ARG1: the scope of a potential interview with the president] .
